titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4605 Tutu Park Mall in St. Thomas, United States Virgin Islands, as the "Kenneth Leslie Harmon Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/8/2012--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4605 Tutu Park Mall in St. Thomas, United States Virgin Islands, as the "Kenneth Leslie Harmon Post Office."
